column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I have been coming to Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba for years. You can always count on this place for a good meal and good service. Whether it's a girls night out
column3: or a very large group dinner
column4: I've never had a bad meal here. I always order the same classic tapas: patatas bravas
column5: goat cheese baked in tomato sauce
column7: etc. and then I usually like to order some seafood tapas such as Gambas al Ajillo or scallops and maybe throw in a few specials. And you can't forget the sangria! Great food. Great service. Great ambiance.
